title: Introducing: Odina
body:
Absolutely adore this stunning debut track from London / Barcelona’s **Odina**.

_You Loved Me, You Killed Me_ owns the sort of  heart-wrenchingly honest lyricism that I’m a just such a sucker for – delivered with a delicate confidence. With a full EP, titled Broken, out later this month, this first offering suggests this may well be the beginning of something very exciting for Odina. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
